div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij
die mensis Decembris quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that
next cumis to Alexander liell and marion' scherar' to Comper
befor thame that thai mycht perempturlie minister Justice to
bath the said' partiis anent the clame of ane almary

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis Decembris anno quo Supra

The saide day Alexander chamer brothir to sere androw chamer oblist him be
his hand' vphaldin to pay ane barrell of Salmond' gude
and Sufficient merchand' gude to William lammyntone at lammes
next to cum quhilk j barrel salmond' the saide Alexander is cumin
dettour for thome chamer talyour'

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem Nono die mensis Januarij Anno Domini Mmo cccco nonagesimo
Sexto quo die Sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo Secte

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholson'
procurator venerabilis virj magistri Duncani scherar' Rectis Rectoris de clat ac
patronj altaris Sancti andree apostoli infra ecclesiam cathedralem abirdonensis
situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
duarum marcarum annuatim sibi et dicto altarj ac capellano eiusdem debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in le hukastarraw
inter terram Robertj evinsone ex orientali et terram Willelmi nicholson'
ex occidentali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringible preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die
huius processus testibus Johanne auchneyve andrea michelson et Andrea
nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus blinsel procurator magistri themannj
crab et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
quadraginta denariorum sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam
Duncanj clat ex orientali et terram quondam henricj tulidef ex occidentali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringible preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
testibus Andrea lammyntone Johanne fechat et Jacobo leis seriando

Eodem die Alexander chamer de murchill legittime vocatus responsurus plegio
super ipsum per andream chamer non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo Dun
brek seriando capere districtum ab eodem et eundem sibi ad plegium dimittj
si petatur ipsummet hodie ad quindenam premunire tanquam 3o die huius processus

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to thome litilJohne
to ansuer to the borghe' Strekit one him be Jonhne andirson for the
wranguis' halding fra him of ix merkis and x s'

The saide day Duncane matheson in Wattirtone deponit the greit
aithe that the lard of Stanyvod' hed takin fra him xxx s' and
xxxiij s' fra Robert Dauison' his nichbouris for ane herreeld' befor thomas
fyf Robert Culane balyes William blinsel patrik leslie and Androw fyf

The saide day thomas mar' oblist him fathtfullie to pay Sex s' Schillingis
for al termes bigane acht' of his wast land' in the vuirkirkgat and yerlie
frathinfurtht Sex s' to the priour' and conuentis of the predicatouris of Abirdene vnto
the tyme the said' land' be strenyeabile to ces' ale proces' leid' tharapon'

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Alexander
bonatmakar to Schew befor thame his chartiris and Richtis that
he will vys' anent the land' liand' at the northt kirk still

The saide day Jonhne Ramsay offerit him redy to stand' at the ordinance
of Certane personis anent the debat betuix him and thomas Alexandersone

The saide day the wif of Jonhne Kethe callit to ansuer to the
borghe Strekit one hir' be alexander liell for the wranguis'
halding of ane almary fra him comperit nocht et cetera for the quhilkis the
balyeis chargit the officiar' James leis to distres' hir' and warne
hir to this day xv dais et cetera

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per fratrem Dauid andirson'
priorem ac procuratorem domus fratrum predicatorum huius burgi deductis de et
super recuperacione proprietatis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico furcarum ex Orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Venerabilis virj magistri alexandri Culane Rectoris de Oyne ex australi ex
vna et terram Robertj Cullane ex boreali partibus ab altera et communes
vias Regias versus oriens et Occidens in defectu solucionis vnius'
annuj redditus octo solidorum a longo tempore eidem loco debit' et non
Solut' vnde dictus prior nomine procuratorio quo Supra peciit a ballivis secundum
formam sui processus precedentis Juris et Justicie Complementum Et porrexit
plegium In manu Jacobj leis sergeandj quod Ipse nomine dicte domus
proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
dicti annuj Redditus Tunc Curia mature auisiata decreuit
quod dictus dominus prior proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime
Recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus Et hoc ex orie ore
Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio datum fuit Testibus
Curia ac thoma mar Johanne andirsone Alexandro liell andrea fyf
Dauid Spens thoma Wod' et tribus seriandis

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes
Kynnynmond' capellanus altaris beate Katherine virginis infra
ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis et protestatus fuit in forma Juris
pro vno annuo Redditu xxxtj d' sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debit'
de quodam crofto vasto Jacente ex occidentali parte vie Regie qua
Itur ad le bolbrige inter terram martinj Kemp ex australi
et croftum fratrum predicatorum huius burgi ex boreali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus
Alexandro Allansone Roberto thendall et Andrea nachtj sergeandoThere is a note in the top right of the page with the three names of the witnesses: 'A alanson R' thedal nachtj sergeando'.

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo die
mensis Januarij anno quo Supra

Eodem die Andreas muresone lammyntone amerciatur per assisam Juratam
ex ore Johannis Colisone prelocutoris assise pro perturbio andree lammynton'
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Et dictus andreas lammynton'
amerciatur pro inuiscacione deportacione duarum vaccarum a dicto Andrea mvreson'
peccunia totali nondum solut'

Eodem die patricius Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas
muresone erit Indempnis pro Andrea lammyntone aliter quam per viam
Juris et Jacobus Colisone deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Andreas
lammyntone erit Indempnis pro dicto Andrea mvreson aliter quam per
viam Juris et vtraque pars obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios
Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxiij die mensis Januarij quo Supra

The saide day Alexander liell lauchfullie Callit and nocht
Comperit to follow ansuer to th the borghe strekit be him
one the wyf of Jonhne Kethe for the wranguis' haldin
of ane almary fra him tharfor Androw fyf procurator for the said'
woman fand' ane borghe in the hand' of James leis sergeand'
that scho is quyt of his challance quhill scho be followit
be new Soyt

Eodem die Alexander chamer legittime vocatus responsurus plegio super eum alias
per Andream chamer porrecto non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo
Dunbrek seriando capere districtum ab eodem et eum ad plegium dimittere
si petatur Ipsummet legittime premunire hodie ad quindenam tanquam quarto
die huius processus

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit be the aldirman
balyeis and Consale for the honor' and defens' of the tone that
euere craftismen' within this burghe' Sale ger mak
ane Standar' for thar craft

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij
die Januarij

the said' day Robert Walcar' was in ane amerciament of the court
be ane Suorne assis' for the wranguis' causing of the
strubulance of Dauid' blinselll and to Amend' as law will et cetera
and the said' Dauid quyt of his al strubulance of the said' Robert
et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirden' tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die Januarij anno quo supra

The said day Wilyam' belte was in ane a merchiament of the court be ane suorne
assis' Johne' collison' forspekar' for strublance of Thomas Waus Ande
to amend as law will ande forbeir' in tyme to cum

The saide day the said Wilyam' beilte was in a merchiament of the court
for be ane suorne assis' Johne' collison' forspekar' for the strublance
of Androw nauchty officiar' ande till a mend as law will and to forbeir'
in tyme to cum

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
februarij anno quo Supra

The saide day Comperit george leslie befor the aldirman balyes and
Consall and present thar' Alexander leslie his sone Innocent and partleis'
of the violence and strublance committit to Dauid fyf as he allegit
offering him to vndir the aldirman and Consal in ony thingis that
mycht be Obiectit In his contrar' in the samyn and the saide Alexander offering
him to mak his purgacion that he was innocent tharintill Item the
saide george present thar paty leslie his brothir Sone quhilkis
grantit the committyng of the saide strubulance and Offence and Offerit
him reddy to vndirlie the ordinance of the aldirman balyeis consale
and gude tone for al offensis committit be him the saide thingis

The said' day It was deliuerit be aldirman and consal
present for the tyme that Dauid Kintor yongar clerk
of Willekynnis Schip sal ansuer to Johne portar'
for ane pety quartar of Salt

The saide day It was deliuerit be the aldirman and Consale
present for the tyme for the gret Offensis committit be Williame
belty agannis thomas Waus that the saide William sal Offir and
present his Crag to the goyf and his knyf in his hand thar to stand
at the wil of the said' thomas And atour the saide William sal cum
One Sonday that next Cumis in the tyme of hie mes' in lynnyng
clathis beir' lege fute and hed' with ane lous' govne and j candill of ane
pvnd of wax in his hande and his dravin knyf in his tothir'
hand' offering the Candill to haly kirk and the knyf to the said'
thomas in takin of Repentance of the saide Offence asking
the said' thomas and his frendis one his k kneys forgyvnes And'
atour the said' William sal pay half ane Stane of wax
to the haly blud' licht Ande atour gyf euir the saide Williame
committis ony offens' or strubulance to the saide thomas or ony vthiris
famous' personis in tymez' to Cum and beis conuikit tharintill he sal
pay tene pundis to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
And to the fulfilling and kepin' of this deliuerance the saidez
Williame and thomas was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis
thar handis vphaldin

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die
mensis februarij Anno quo Supra

head.add: Inquisicio in deseruicione breuis thome menyes

div.p:
Eodem die Alexander Rede Johannes Cullane Johannes Colisone
thomas prat Andreas branche Johannes Wormet Jacobus colison
Alexander gray Willelmus futhes Johannes blak matheus branche
Robertus Crag Dauid mar' Willelmus goldsmitht et Dauid
Steuart Jurati dicunt quod quondam thom Johannes menyeis
frater germanus thome menyeis latoris presencium obiit vltimo
vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis vnius annuj Redditus triginta
trium solidorum et quatuor denariorum vsualis monete scocie annuatim
leuand' de vna terra quondam Johannis andree Jacente infra predictum burgum in vico Nauium
ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam margarete Cryne ex occidentali
ex vna et communionem venellam qua Itur ad capellam Sancte Katherine
virginis ex orientali partibus ab altera Et de feodo duarum terrarum
collatarum Jacencium in eodem vico inter dictam terram ex australi ex vna et
terram laurencij Johannis alias Deif ex boreali partibus ab altera et communionem venellam
qua Itur ad capellam Sancte Katherine virginis versus oriens et terram olim
dicte margarete versus occidens Et quod dictus thomas est legittimis et propinquior
heres dicti quondam Johannis fratris suj de dictis annuo Redditu et duobus
terris Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod valunt nunc per annum quadraginta
s' et tantum valuerunt tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in capite de
Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existunt
In manibus domini nostri per Spacium duorum mensium aut eocirca in defectu
viri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis datum et clausum et cetera
